title: 엔트로피를 넘어서 서식 표지
content:
[[iftags +템플릿]]
[[=]]
[[[beyond-entropy-hub|엔트로피를 넘어서]]] 서식 템플릿입니다. [[*user thd-glasses]] 제작.

:필요한 입력값:
**$cellnum**
**$cellname**
**$codetype**
**$preset**
**$title**
[[/=]]
[[/iftags]]

[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin:auto; width:100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:3px; width:20%; background:#210B61; text-align:center;"]]
[[image beyond-entropy-hub/BE-logo-title.png width="40px"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding:3px; width:60%; background:#210B61; text-align:center; color: white;"]]
[[size 200%]]**{$cellnum}**[[/size]]
[[size 300%]]**//{$cellname}//**[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="padding:3px; width:20%; background:#210B61; text-align:center; color: white;"]]
**암호 유형**
[[size 200%]]**{$codetype},,{$preset},,**[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:3px; background:#FFFFFF; text-align:center;" colspan="3"]]
++* **{$title}**
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

@@@@
@@@@
author: thd-glasses
